casebody.data:
IN RE: ESTATE OF Sophia M. KRASINSKI, a/k/a Sophia Krasinski a/k/a Sofia Krasinsky, Late of Morrisdale, (Cooper Township) Clearfield County, Pennsylvania Deceased on 11/04/06 Petition of: Sophia Krasinski and Edward Krasinski No. 259 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. December 4, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 4th day of December, 2018, the Cross Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. The Application for Relief as to Cross Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied as moot.
